title-group.article-title: Ugaritic Studies and Israelite Religion: A Retrospective View

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2003 American Schools of Oriental Research

abstract.p: The author surveys the field of Ugaritic studies in the twentieth century, outlining the development of new scholarly interests and approaches as well as their attendant difficulties, especially in the study of religion, one of the fields that captivated W. F. Albright's interest.
